luckmanmod:LuckPower.NAME: Luck
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the chance to get the Lucky effect of a card by #b
Decrease the chance to get the Lucky effect of a card by #b

luckmanmod:UnluckyPower.NAME: Unlucky
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot be Lucky this turn.

luckmanmod:LoseLuckPower.NAME: Lose Luck
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b

luckmanmod:BetAgainstPower.NAME: Bet Against
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you don't get the Lucky effect, gain #b

luckmanmod:RidiculousCrusadePower.NAME: Crusading
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you get the Lucky effect, draw #b

luckmanmod:ImpossiblePrecisionPower.NAME: Impossible Precision
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yAttack, lose all your #yStrength.

luckmanmod:BloodPactPower.NAME: Blood Pact
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, lose #b

luckmanmod:WhatDoTheyWantPower.NAME: What Do They Want?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b

luckmanmod:RidonkulousPower.NAME: Ridonkulous
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Channel #b

luckmanmod:RiggedPower.NAME: Rigged System
DESCRIPTIONS: The next card you play is Lucky.
